meanings.definition: A dish of rice cooked in seasoned broth with meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The pilau at the party was delicious and filled with flavorful meat.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best pilau with chicken and peas for dinner.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone fought over the last serving of pilau.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the pilau filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pilau on the plate looked like a work of art.

meanings.definition: To cook rice in seasoned broth with meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I will pilau the rice for dinner tonight with some tasty spices.
meanings.sent2: She loves to pilau the rice slowly to let the flavors blend perfectly.
meanings.sent3: As a chef, his specialty is to pilau rice to perfection every time.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of pilauing rice filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: Watching her pilau the rice was like witnessing a culinary masterpiece.
